Extract Raw Base schedule

dot-extract_base_schedule.Rd

Extracts the date, team's played and the results

.extract_base_schedule(team_id, year, sport)

Arguments

team_id

Team ID (form team_mapping)
sprt

Tradiational Sport Name
yr

Select year, (example: 2015-2016 season is 2016)

Examples
